Verses: 1 yodhaam Raajaavaagirapodhu Irubaththaindhu Vayadhaayirundhu, Padhinaaru Varusham Erusalemile Arasaandaan; Saadhokkin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Avan Thaayinper Erusaal.

2 avan Than Thagappanaagiya Usiyaa Seydhapadiyellaam Karththarin Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Seydhaan; Aanaalum Avanaippolak Karththarin Aalayaththirkul Pravesiyaadhirundhaan; Janangal Innum Thangalaik Keduththukkondirundhaargal.
3 avan Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Uyarndha Vaasalaik Kattinadhumallaamal, Obelin Madhilinmel Anega Kattadangalaiyum Kattinaan.
4 yoodhaavin Malaigalile Pattanangalaiyum, Kaadugalile Kottaigalaiyum Koburangalaiyum Kattinaan.

5 avan Ammon Puththirarudaiya Raajaavodu Yuththampanni Avargalai Merkondaan; Aadhalaal Ammon Puththirar Avanukku Andha Varushaththile Nooruthaalandhu Velliyaiyum, Padhinaayirankalak Kodhumaiyaiyum, Padhinaayirankala Vaarkodhumaiyaiyum Koduththaargal; Irandaam Moondraam Varushaththilum Ammon Puththirar Appadiye Avanukku Seluththinaargal.
6 yodhaam Than Vazhigalaith Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Munbaaga Neraakkinadhinaal Balappattaan.
7 yodhaamin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avanudaiya Sagala Yuththangalum, Avanudaiya Nadaigalum, Isravel Yoodhaa Raajaakkalin Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
8 avan Raajaavaagirapodhu Irubaththaindhu Vayadhaayirundhu, Padhinaaru Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan.
9 yodhaam Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapinbu, Avanai Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththile Adakkampanninaargal; Avan Kumaaranaagiya, Aagaas Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
